content: celebrate croissants by making my crochet croissant pattern i promise you this is one croissant that won t leave crumbs all over your lap **materials** ▢red heart yarn - gold ▢red heart yarn - black ▢red heart yarn - red ▢safety eyes ▢polyfill ▢furls crochet 5mm hook ▢3 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch
